TopicTitle: In honour of the Pluto Flyby

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/29MWXelqyyg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Sort of a micro-movie compared to the last time that I tried to do anything cinematic in KSP. Disappointingly I accidentally crushed the video quality a few times during editing and didn't have an opportunity to re-record anything. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Not really sure what other subjects to visit while making KSP shorts. I'm still hanging out for someone to make a free camera mod for IVA. Anyone else feel this way?? Haha.
Excellent work.....I love the ages of the Kerbals. A very nice touch ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

One problem... is it just me or are the kerbals *extremely* creepy looking? ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

Other than that it's great! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Most of us probably prefer to think of them as forever young, haha.

Excellent Movie. Well done.

I especially love the classic science show looks of it and the details, you added to the characters ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Excellent work. I am a big fan of *In the Shadow of the Moon* and this movie captures the feel of that documentary well.
I've always liked Shadow of the Moon for the 'no narrator, just astronauts' approach. Thanks for the kind words
